text:
Yes,
I want to layer and loop them on the spot...

Is that so...
To captivate with contemporary dance and just one sound...

But if that's the decision, then we have no choice but to do it.
...Nanakusa-san, are you okay with that?

But you know... just singing "ah" for one note...
It's so much pressure...

Hehehe. You thought it was so easy, right?
...Your legs will give out, just watch.

You can't fake it, you know?
If you mess up the pitch or start shaking, it's over...

You can't rely on having people listen to the lyrics or enjoy the melody...
Can't even get into the rhythm. Charm becomes meaningless.

...It's incredible.
It's like neutralizing all the weapons of an idol.

Stop dancing and
focus on layering voices instead?

────────!
So, you're telling me to just sing "ah"... is that it...?!

That's why I'm saying I'll stop...!
I'm not... I'm not so...!

Before saying 'I'm not so useful'...
...I want you to think about what you truly value.

...Of course, there could be another opportunity, or we could think
about trying again after the two of you have improved your skills.

But, right now, we only have one chance.
...There's no guarantee we'll get another opportunity like this.

That's right. If you have an ideal in mind, it's okay to stop...
...But I want you to think about what you value the most.
